title: ISic002992. I.Sicily inscription 002992
body:
Facsimile Images

[Θ(εοῖς)] Χ(θονίοις)
[---] Βασι-
[λὼ χαῖ]ρε ἔζη-
[σες ἔτ]η ((·)) κ((·))ε´ ((·)) καὶ
5[ἔνθα κ]ατοικεῖς
[εἰς τ]οὺς αἰῶ-
[νε]ς ((ivy-leaf))

Apparatus criticus

Text after Libertini 1949

English translation

Farewell worthy Basilo! You lived for 25 years and you'll live here forever.

Italian translation

Addio, degna Basilo! Vivesti 25 anni e qui abiti nei secoli.

commentary

bibliography

  • Libertini 1949 96-97 no. 3 fig. 4 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001865
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence
